summary: Four criminals commit a robbery at a soccer stadium, and then split up to try to hide separately from the police.
cast: Gina Lollobrigida|Renato Baldini|Cosetta Greco|Paul Muller|Fausto Tozzi|Enzo Maggio Jr.|Tamara Lees|Emma Baron|Patrizia Manca|Giuseppe Chinnici|Vincenzo Tocci|Amedeo Trilli|Ferdinando Lattanzi|Mario Besesti|Yvonne Cocco|Nino Javert|Maria Tedeschi
